sentences.en: a circus performer on stilts
sentences.cn: 马戏团里踩高跷的演员

sentences.en: A circus show entertains children.
sentences.cn: 马戏表演使孩子们兴高采烈.

sentences.en: circus act (=a trick performed in a circus)
sentences.cn: 马戏表演

sentences.en: Circus monkeys are trained to be very docile and obedient.
sentences.cn: 马戏团的猴子训练得服服贴贴的.

sentences.en: circus ring (=a large circular area where tricks are performed)
sentences.cn: 马戏表演场

sentences.en: Do you know what? I'm going to the circus this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 你知道吗？我下午要去看马戏。

sentences.en: He described the smell as something between a circus and a sea-port.
sentences.cn: 他形容那种气味介于马戏团和海港的味道之间。

sentences.en: I used to like the clowns best at the circus.
sentences.cn: 我以前在马戏里最爱看小丑.

sentences.en: I was always fascinated by the acrobats at the circus.
sentences.cn: 我总是着迷于马戏团里的杂技演员.

sentences.en: It could well turn into some kind of a media circus.
sentences.cn: 这很可能会演变成媒体的一场闹剧。

sentences.en: It's been like Piccadilly Circus in this house all morning.
sentences.cn: 这房子里整个上午都忙乱得像皮卡迪利广场。

sentences.en: My dad took me to the circus.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸带我去看马戏。

sentences.en: My real ambition was to work in a circus.
sentences.cn: 我真正的理想是去马戏团工作。

sentences.en: Piccadilly Circus
sentences.cn: 皮卡迪利广场

sentences.en: She dreamed of being a bareback rider in a circus.
sentences.cn: 她梦想成为马戏团中的一名无鞍马骑手。

sentences.en: The couple married in the Caribbean to avoid a media circus.
sentences.cn: 为了摆脱媒体的关注，这对新人在加勒比喜结连理。

sentences.en: The first day of school is always such a circus.
sentences.cn: 开学第一天总是这样闹哄哄的。

sentences.en: The whole town turned out to see the circus.
sentences.cn: 倾城而出看马戏表演.

sentences.en: There is a Piccadilly Circus in London.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦有个皮卡迪利广场.

sentences.en: We took the children to the circus.
sentences.cn: 我们带孩子去看了马戏表演。

trans.tran_en: a group of people and animals who travel to different places performing skilful tricks as entertainment
